channel.title: Apple on ifconfig.it
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on ifconfig.it

item.title: Airfoil
item.description:
Apple’s Airport Express is a multi-pourpose device that I really like. It is small, not energy hungry and has many features. Wireless music streaming is a very useful feature, but it’s limited to use iTunes as source. Today I bought Airfoil that allows to stream the audio from any running program on PC or MAC.
Now I can stream music from any online service like Grooveshark or RdioÂ to my home stereo.
